info.headline: Tornado Warning issued June 7 at 6:15PM MDT until June 7 at 6:45PM MDT by NWS Albuquerque NM
info.description:
TORABQ
The National Weather Service in Albuquerque has issued a
* Tornado Warning for... West Central Union County in northeastern New Mexico...
* Until 645 PM MDT.
* At 615 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a significant tornado was located near Gladstone, or 29 miles south of Des Moines, moving southeast at 20 mph.
This is a PARTICULARLY DANGEROUS SITUATION. TAKE COVER NOW!
HAZARD...Damaging tornado and quarter size hail.
SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation.
IMPACT...You are in a life-threatening situation. Flying debris may be deadly to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be destroyed. Considerable damage to homes, businesses, and vehicles is likely and complete destruction is possible.
* Locations impacted include... Gladstone.
info.instruction: Move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a well-built building away from windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.

National Weather Service: TORNADO WARNING in this area until 6:45 PM MDT. Take shelter now in a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris. Check media.
